description:
ActualERC721Staking._calculateRewards(uint256,uint256) (src/nfts/staking/ActualERC721Staking.sol#182-184) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- rewards = (timeStaked / REWARD_TIME) * amountStaked (src/nfts/staking/ActualERC721Staking.sol#183)
